name: Class Editori S.p.A.
goal:
Publishing House leader in financial information, lifestyle, fashion and luxury for the upper class and owner through its subsidiaries and / or affiliates of a variety of media.
We pursue the goal of protecting our rights and developing our resources, including through participation in the development and implementation of policies and decision-making processes of the EU institutions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
all that pertains to the copyright and in particular rights under EU legislation on copyright and intellectual property at large

privacy law GDPR
